title: seek3r
author: seek3r
content: The will be the 2nd of a few auctions. Over the next few days/weeks I'll be breaking up the rest of my Coldkey collection and gradually offering it in auctions here.I have the complete History series for 2020 with the same serial - maybe interesting for one or the othern Coldkey Lover  Time for Q2 of the 2020 series!Enclosed is a little reference: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5422960.msg61340893#msg61340893Up for sale are  3 LOTS of Coldkey cards - every LOT has the serial #22  made by yogg (Mr. Coldkey)The History series cards are loaded with the displayed amount.LOT 1: History Series 2020 #22 "bc1qckqvn5..." - AprilSTARTING BID: 0.0085 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTC LOT 2: History Series 2020 #22 "bc1qckqz5c..." - MaySTARTING BID: 0.0065 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTC LOT 3: History Series 2020 #22 "bc1qckq9fy..." - JuneSTARTING BID: 0.007 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005 BTC END TIME: December 30th, 2022, 23:00:00 GMT+1 (Hamburg time) TIMER: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?p0=307&iso=20221230T23&year=2022&month=12&day=30&hour=23&min=0&sec=0&msg=Q2%20COLDKEY&csz=1AUCTION TERMSSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: I only accept Bitcoin to following address: 33eedyLSbqawsLZWexYxioHzvYDSxZ84xYPayment has to be done within 24 hours after the auction has ended.SHIPPING: WORLDWIDEShipping costs will be paid by the winner, winner is also responsible for any local customs/duties/VAT fees.Item will be shipped from Germany.ESCROW: Accepted at buyers expense - would prefer minerjones' service*** I also reserve the right to exclude anyone from bidding if they got a bunch of negative trust. ***

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 1: .0085Lot 2: .0065Lot 3: .0070Probably not many opportunities to catch full sets. Is there any reference site to see which coldkey-card were released exactly? I have a vague knowledge but missed some and an overview of them would be nice to have.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on December 25, 2022, 08:30:04 PMProbably not many opportunities to catch full sets. Is there any reference site to see which coldkey-card were released exactly? I have a vague knowledge but missed some and an overview of them would be nice to have.This is something I've actually been working on (and off lol) for some time... I started with Krogs's initial thread, but the full list is now longer and will take some more time, but when done will be on the new/updated coldkey website (That is the plan, anyhow).

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on December 25, 2022, 09:43:48 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on December 25, 2022, 08:30:04 PMProbably not many opportunities to catch full sets. Is there any reference site to see which coldkey-card were released exactly? I have a vague knowledge but missed some and an overview of them would be nice to have.This is something I've actually been working on (and off lol) for some time... I started with Krogs's initial thread, but the full list is now longer and will take some more time, but when done will be on the new/updated coldkey website (That is the plan, anyhow). maybe my own ccc thread will also help you both: [INFO] CCC - cygan's crypto collection - constantly updatedthere you can see in any case all complete ColdKey series/editions

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on December 25, 2022, 09:43:48 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on December 25, 2022, 08:30:04 PMProbably not many opportunities to catch full sets. Is there any reference site to see which coldkey-card were released exactly? I have a vague knowledge but missed some and an overview of them would be nice to have.This is something I've actually been working on (and off lol) for some time... I started with Krogs's initial thread, but the full list is now longer and will take some more time, but when done will be on the new/updated coldkey website (That is the plan, anyhow). Nice, looking forward to it. There are way more coldkeys out there than I was aware of. Quote from: cygan on December 26, 2022, 08:37:04 AM[...]maybe my own ccc thread will also help you both: [INFO] CCC - cygan's crypto collection - constantly updatedthere you can see in any case all complete ColdKey series/editions My goodness, that thread (I haven't visited in a while) is always a stunner. And indeed great reference to any coldkeys - however, for whatever reason, many of the historic CC series image's didn't load. It felt like a browser problem, but happend in Firefox as well as Chrome.
